Subject: SIEM configuration
Description:
Hello, 

I sync my EPP server with a SIEM collector, but I can't see logs on the other side. I Don't find any way to troubleshoot or further test if the SIEM is working. Also, as the server was created on a onpremise server in Azure, we are missing credentials to access the ubuntu via SSH.
What_We_Know__c:
the customer does not receive any logs in the SIEM server, and I think it is due to the fact that we send in the syslog-ng format and they are waiting for the rsyslog format.
I asked the customer to configure the SIEM server for syslog-ng and to let me know the outcome
